issues.description:
Function BuyMode2(uint256,uint256,address,bytes32,bytes32,uint8) retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description:
Function ValidMode2Score(uint256,uint256,bytes32,bytes32,uint8) retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description:
Function BuyMode2WithDividends(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,bytes32,bytes32,uint8) retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description: This contract executes a message call to to another contract. Make sure that the called contract is trusted and does not execute user-supplied code.
issues.title: Message call to external contract

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function BuyMode2WithDividends(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,bytes32,bytes32,uint8). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
